version_description:
- Play the beginning for free!
- In-app purchase the full game
+ 21 new languages now available
> If you encounter any update issue please contact arte-experience@artefrance.fr

- Play 9 levels for free or unlock all 31 levels with a one-time purchase!
- Fixed an issue that made levels Celtic and Witchcraft unplayable on some devices
- 21 new languages now available
> If you encounter any update issue please contact arte-experience@artefrance.fr
